__e: Do I sense seeds of darkness within?
"There was in that time darkness on the face of the earth..."
And it's the only thing keeping the darkness where it belongs.
We'll see if your faith succeeds in consoling you!
It's darkness, and whenever I have come up against it, I have gone nowhere.
I saw you ... walk in darkness ... and I know you do not feel so bad there.
Kind of like there was this darkness inside me...
Darkness is not the only power in this world.
Meaning? Maybe there's no darkness inside you.
But that same man stands before you now, and the darkness is behind us.
The darkness is in my daughter, so every choice I make is for the good of my family.
To shroud my clothes, the black of night.
We've been trying to find a way to get the Light and the Dark to work together for a common good.
You're the one who said he could come back from the darkness the same way you did.
Not with the Prince of Darkness up there waiting for us.
I think maybe the darkness finds you and me.
It was the only way to destroy the darkness in both of us.
